label: 阿弥陀仏
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Highly revered in Japanese Buddhism. Believers call on his name in order to be reborn into his western paradise, or pure land (jōdo). In Buddhist art, he is often shown descendingwith a heavenly host to escort a dying soul into paradise. [浄土]
